actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize certain alternatives to secondary treatment for publicly owned treatment works.

summary.text: Authorizes an alternative treatment, under the Water Pollution Control Act, in the case of any publicly owned treatment works required to use secondary treatment. Requires that an application and satisfactory showing be made that such alternative would result in an equal or preferable effect on the receiving waters at a lesser cost.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize certain alternatives to secondary treatment for publicly owned treatment works.
